README for Iframe Code Source
=============================

This README should reside inside a Silva Code Source named
'cs_iframe'.  The Code Source allows Authors to embed iframes in a
document. The code source also checks for allowed urls by the site
manager.

Customizing Google Maps Code Source
-----------------------------------

The code in the page template named 'iframe_renderer' can be easily
adjusted to your personal requirements. 

Parameters
----------

  - Add a url (which is checked against an ok list. The is in the
    'Properties' tab of the content view of the code source).

  - Add the iFrame code. 

  - Add height

  - Add width

--
Improvements and variants are welcome.
